text: Sir William Hall-Jones, KCMG (16 January 1851 â€“ 19 June 1936) was the 16th Prime Minister of New Zealand from June 1906 until August 1906. He was the interim Prime Minister after the death of Richard Seddon and the return from overseas of Joseph Ward. ==References== ==Other websites== * Prime Ministers Office Biography: William Hall-Jones Category:1851 births Category:1936 deaths Category:People from Folkestone Category:Politicians from Kent Category:Prime Ministers of New Zealand
